resources.string: Deleting reconciled transactions will cause your records to differ from the bank statement.
Please compare the cleared total with the ending balance in your bank statement. If you proceed, cleared transactions will be marked as reconciled.
You need to enable this widget in the app settings.
Quick instantiation of templates from this widget only works if you allow data entry from widgets without password in the app settings.
Setting a security question allows you to unlock the app, in case you forget your password.
If you set a password, take care not to forget it. You will not be able to recover it, unless you set a security question.
If you proceed, all transactions of this account are deleted from the database and cannot be restored.
If you proceed, for all accounts%1$s, transactions will be deleted from the database and cannot be restored.
If you proceed, transactions matched by the current filter will be deleted from the database and cannot be restored.
Database and preferences will be restored from file \"%1$s\". The current data will be deleted. Do you want to continue?

The currently selected folder for backups and exports will be automatically deleted by Android if you uninstall {app_name}. You can prevent this from happening by selecting a different folder from the Settings screen.
Transfers that are part of a split can only be edited in the context of the split.
Please set a number between %1$d and %2$d
Amounts in the database need to be updated in order to match the new number of fraction digits.
If amounts are not updated, they will be displayed as multiplied by %d after the change.
If amounts are not updated, they will be displayed as divided by %d after the change.
If amounts are updated, you will lose the information about their fractional part.
Please provide a file of type %1$s
The currently selected folder for backups and exports (%1$s) is not accessible. Please select a different one.
The currently configured URI for backups and exports (%1$s) is not supported under Android Nougat. Please select a folder again.
Today\'s special offer with AppGratis: Premium features unlocked for free.
Should data be filled in automatically from last transaction for same payee/payer? You can always change this behaviour from the settings.

A short tap on an entry in this list will instantiate the template and either save it immediately or enter its editing form where you can modify it before saving. You can always access both actions through a long tap, and change the default in the settings.

Backup database daily at the specified time (only if data has changed).

The limit for free successful automatic backups has been reached.
{app_name} needs permission to access your calendar, in order to create plans for future and recurring transactions.
Use the Up and Down commands in each item\'s context menu to change its sort position.
This split transaction cannot be moved to account %1$s because there are transfer parts that refer to this account.
Your transaction has been completed, and a receipt for your purchase has been emailed to you. You may log into your account at www.paypal.com to view details of this transaction.
An unexpected error occurred forcing the application to stop. Please help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to do is click OK.
You might add your comments about the problem below:
Please enter the URL to a special folder on your WebDAV server. {app_name} will store its data inside this folder, it won\'t touch anything outside of it.
The website uses a certificate, which is not trusted by Android.
The certificate could not be trusted. It seems invalid.
The URL does not point to a WebDAV resource.
The URL does not exist on the server.
How often should data be synchronized (in hours)
If you unlink this account from %s, the synchronization status gets lost. Linking them again later, requires a full synchronization to be executed again.

An account with uuid %s exists both in the local database and on the remote backend. When you link both, you need to decide, if, initially, you want to upload local data to the remote backend or download remote data to the local database.
An account with uuid %s already exists in the local database and is linked to a different remote backend.
Remote backend %s will be removed. This will not affect data stored locally or remotely, but synchronization status gets lost. Do you want to continue?
Remote data for this account will be deleted. Make sure no other devices are linked to it.
Local data for this account will be deleted.
The synchronization feature can be tested until %s.
The trial period for testing the synchronization feature has ended.
This folder is used for synchronizing data between installations of {app_name} on different devices. Please do not modify any of its contents manually.
The folder you have selected corresponds to one account of an existing backend. You need to select its parent folder in order to reuse this backend.
Select accounts to be synced to this backend
%d accounts were configured to be synced with the backend.
%d accounts could not be configured to be synced with the backend.
An account with the same uuid already exists on the remote backend.
The conflict can be resolved manually from the entry\'s context menu.
In addition to local storage on the device, the backup file can be copied to a remote backend.
Create a synchronization backend from the main settings screen.
An error occurred while trying to store backup file %1$s on backend %2$s:
Shortcuts can be added by long-tapping the app icon on the Home Screen.
Auto-backup has been deactivated. You can turn it on again from the settings after solving the problem (e.g. selecting a different folder for backups).
Allow us to collect anonymous data about usage patterns that helps us plan improvements.
A database error occurred during synchronization.
Error while setting up remote account.
Error while reading changes from backend.
Error while syncing changes with server.
Error while removing lock from remote backend.
Remote backend is locked or cannot be locked.
%1$d remote changes were written to local database. %2$d local changes were written to remote backend.

Let us set up your first account
Write debugging information into system log
Please save the template first. The plan will then be opened in the calendar app, where you can set a custom recurrence.
The source you selected can only be read if you grant the permission to read from external storage.
Device limit exceeded. Please remove licence from another device.
If you no longer need premium functionality on this device, you can remove the licence key. This frees the key for activation on one more other device. The key can be activated on up to %d devices.
Licence key was successfully freed from this device.
For residents of the European Union prices displayed do not include VAT.
{app_name} implements a new licence validation mechanism. Please request a new key.

Users who already own the Extended Licence pay 50%% of the regular price (%s) in the first year.
Users who already own the Extended Licence are entitled to a %1$d%% reduction from the regular price (%2$s) of the yearly subscription.

Only when started from aggregate account.

The selected transactions will be grouped into one split transaction. Their date information will be lost, i.e. replaced by their average.
The selected split transactions will be ungrouped, i.e. their split parts will become normal transactions.
